categories: Category:Star Wars: The Clone Wars home video releases

nodes.text: The Nightsisters Trilogy: Feature-Length Cut is a home video compilation of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episodes "Nightsisters," "Monster," and "Witches of the Mist," along with a four-minute behind the scenes interview with Supervising Director Dave Filoni. The video was originally shown at select screenings in 2010, and it was published as an iTunes digital download on December 5, 2011.

Executive Producer George Lucas and Lucasfilm Animation present "The Nightsisters Trilogy: Feature-length Cut" from the popular animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars. Shown only at selected screenings in 2010, enjoy this uninterrupted version of all three episodes from The Nightsisters Trilogy including "Nightsisters", "Monster" and "Witches of the Mist".
